content: free pdf pattern can be downloaded here https //www sweetsofties com/2023/11/the-perfect-bao html free video tutorial https //youtu be/e0x3ewfr_ku the perfect bao is a quick easy and no-sew crochet pattern bao otherwise known as a chinese steamed bun or baozi is a popular food found in asian cuisine you can also use this pattern to make a momo dumpling or xiaolongbao it s the perfect gift for a foodie or asian culture enthusiast a free step-by-step video tutorial is available with this written pattern **size** 3 inches 7 5cm in height and width **materials** super bulky weight 6 yarn in white i used hobbii honey bunny yarn embroidery thread/yarn in pink and black 5mm crochet hook 12mm plastic safety eyes x2 stuffing yarn needle scissors **level** ★☆☆☆☆ familiar beginner requires familiarity with stitches used below **stitches & techniques used us terminology ** fo = fasten_off chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase insert 2 single_crochet in same st decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 sts together flo = front loops only *copyright notice this pattern is © 2023 sweet softies www sweetsofties com for personal use only you may not translate distribute copy alter or sell this pattern in any way my patterns may not be used in video tutorials or for teaching classes both online and in-person you may link to this pattern but you may not copy any part of the pattern instructions on other websites you may sell finished items made with this pattern if you credit sweet softies as the designer and link to my website no wholesale *
